means: 重新分配( redistribute的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Wealth was redistributed more equitably among society.
sentence.Network_cn: 财富实现了在社会中更加公平地再分配。

sentence.Network_en: Wealth needs to be redistributed from the rich to the poor.
sentence.Network_cn: 需要将财富从富人那里重新分给穷人。

sentence.Network_en: I was prepared to see my belongings rapidly'redistributed '.
sentence.Network_cn: 我准备眼看我的这些东西很快地被 “ 共产 ”.

list.abs: 力矩分配法 moment distribution method力矩再分配 moment redistribution分配系数 distribution factor
fluid pumpability 流体可泵性fluid redistribution 流体再分布fluid resistance 流体阻力
phase quadrature 90度相位差phase redistribution 相态重新分布phase region 相区
redissolved gas 重新溶解的气体redistributed production 再分配的产量redistribution 再分布

entry.def: If something such as money or property is redistributed, it is shared among people or organizations in a different way from the way that it was previously shared.

example.ex: Wealth was redistributed more equitably among society...
example.tran: 财富实现了在社会中更加公平地再分配。

example.ex: Taxes could be used to redistribute income.
example.tran: 税收可以用来对收入进行再分配。

means.word_mean: 1. having population and industries relocated from urban to outlying areas;

auth_sentence.content: This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
auth_sentence.res_content: This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.

auth_sentence.content: Much of that cargo is unpacked and redistributed at warehouses across the region.
auth_sentence.res_content: Much of that cargo is unpacked and redistributed at warehouses across the region.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Much of that cargo is unpacked and redistributed at warehouses across the region.

auth_sentence.content: Many were seen as potential MDC supporters, and were therefore not allocated any of the redistributed land.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many were seen as potential MDC supporters, and were therefore not allocated any of the redistributed land.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many were seen as potential MDC supporters, and were therefore not allocated any of the redistributed land.
